document.comment: Tools for credible digital twins documentation master file, created by sphinx-quickstart on Thu Mar 2 08:49:28 2023. You can adapt this file completely to your liking, but it should at least contain the root `toctree` directive.

section.names: tools\ for\ credible\ modelling\ of\ digital\ twins
section.title: Tools for credible modelling of digital twins
section.paragraph: This is a Sphinx placeholder index page for the EMBC’23 workshop docs. It will not be displayed on the resulting website at: https://tools-for-credible-digital-twins.github.io/, but should be used for rendering and navigating content in your local working environment.

compact_paragraph.reference: Using standards in your own tools
Creating, editing, and simulating models with OpenCOR

citation.label: BGP+21
